def_en: A confession is a signed statement by someone in which they admit that they have committed a particular crime.

def_cn: (对使自己羞愧或尴尬之事的)承认，坦白
def_en: Confession is the act of admitting that you have done something that you are ashamed of or embarrassed about.
If you make a confession of your beliefs or feelings, you publicly tell people that this is what you believe or feel.

def_cn: (天主教会等的)忏悔，告解，办神工
def_en: In the Catholic church and in some other churches, if you go to confession, you privately tell a priest about your sins and ask for forgiveness.
